sig_info: When Nick would be knocked out, his Life Model Decoy is destroyed instead and he returns to the fight with a permanent Fury’s Fury Buff and Stun Immunity. However, Nick loses his Infinity Formula and begins taking Direct Damage equal to 5 to 3.3% of his health per second for the rest of the quest while above 30% max health. The destruction of Nick’s decoy Removes all Effects and isn't affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.

BATTLE SCARS: When striking a Bleeding Opponent Nick’s Critical Rating is increased by 177.78 and his attacks ignore 100% of Physical Resistance.
While the Opponent is not under the effect of a Regeneration Buff all of Nick’s Bleeds are 100% more potent.
BASIC ATTACKS: Ending a combo with a Light Attack has a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed, dealing 37.35 damage over 1 second.
Landing any Medium Attack has a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed, dealing 2.08 damage over 6 seconds.
Landing a Heavy Attack has a 100% chance to inflict up to 3 stacks of Bleed, each dealing 4.15 damage over 12 seconds.
When hitting into Auto-Block Nick is Stun Immune and has a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed dealing 4.15 damage over 12 seconds.
Knocking down the Opponent Purifies Nick's non-damaging Debuffs.
INTERNAL BLEED - PASSIVE: If the Opponent gets 8 stacks of Bleed, their Bleed effects are removed and replaced with a Passive Internal Bleed effect which deals 224.1 damage over 30 seconds.
While Internal Bleed is active all the Opponent's Bleed Debuffs have an increased duration of 0.2 seconds per Tactical Charge.
TACTICAL ADVANTAGE CHARGES - PASSIVE: Nick starts the fight with 6 Charges when fighting an Avenger.
When Nick is Struck he has a 100% chance to gain 1 Tactical Charge. Reduced to 25% against Mutant Opponents.
While Nick is under the effect of a Fury Effect, Tactical Charge durations are paused.
Nick loses 1 Charge every 6 seconds, decreasing to every 4 seconds while at or above 10 total Charges. Additionally if the Opponent performs a Well-Timed Block Nick loses 1 Charge.
At 5+ Charges: Nick's attacks can’t Miss or be Evaded.
At 10+ Charges: Nick's Purify effects now target all Debuffs.
At 15+ Charges: Nick becomes Unblockable.
At 20+ Charges: All Charges are removed and replaced with a Fury’s Fury Buff which grants 149.4 Attack Rating for 10 seconds. All Tactical Charge gains are doubled while Fury’s Fury is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: When performing this attack Nick immediately gains 4 Tactical charges.
Disorients the Opponent, reducing their Block Proficiency by 50% and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 70% for 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Nick slashes his Opponent causing up to 4 stacks of Bleed, each dealing 20.75 damage over 8 seconds.
50% chance to stun the Opponent for 3 seconds. Stun chance increases by a flat 10% for each of Nick’s Tactical charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Additional 166 Attack if Fury’s Fury is active.
Additional 166 Attack if Internal Bleed is active.

When hitting into Auto-Block Nick is Stun Immune and has a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed dealing 43.05 damage over 12 seconds.
Knocking down the Opponent Purifies Nick's non-damaging Debuffs.
INTERNAL BLEED - PASSIVE: If the Opponent gets 8 stacks of Bleed, their Bleed effects are removed and replaced with a Passive Internal Bleed effect which deals 2324.7 damage over 30 seconds.
While Internal Bleed is active all the Opponent's Bleed Debuffs have an increased duration of 0.2 seconds per Tactical Charge.
TACTICAL ADVANTAGE CHARGES - PASSIVE: Nick starts the fight with 6 Charges when fighting an Avenger.
When Nick is Struck he has a 100% chance to gain 1 Tactical Charge. Reduced to 25% against Mutant Opponents.
While Nick is under the effect of a Fury Effect, Tactical Charge durations are paused.
Nick loses 1 Charge every 6 seconds, decreasing to every 4 seconds while at or above 10 total Charges. Additionally if the Opponent performs a Well-Timed Block Nick loses 1 Charge.
At 5+ Charges: Nick's attacks can’t Miss or be Evaded.
At 10+ Charges: Nick's Purify effects now target all Debuffs.
At 15+ Charges: Nick becomes Unblockable.
At 20+ Charges: All Charges are removed and replaced with a Fury’s Fury Buff which grants 1549.8 Attack Rating for 10 seconds. All Tactical Charge gains are doubled while Fury’s Fury is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: When performing this attack Nick immediately gains 4 Tactical charges.
Disorients the Opponent, reducing their Block Proficiency by 50% and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 70% for 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Nick slashes his Opponent causing up to 4 stacks of Bleed, each dealing 215.25 damage over 8 seconds.
50% chance to stun the Opponent for 3 seconds. Stun chance increases by a flat 10% for each of Nick’s Tactical charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Additional 1722 Attack if Fury’s Fury is active.
Additional 1722 Attack if Internal Bleed is active.

sig_info: When Nick would be knocked out, his Life Model Decoy is destroyed instead and he returns to the fight with a permanent Fury’s Fury Buff and Stun Immunity. However, Nick loses his Infinity Formula and begins taking Direct Damage equal to 5 to 3.3% of his health per second for the rest of the quest while above 30% max health. The destruction of Nick’s decoy Removes all Effects and isn't affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.

When Nick is Struck he has a 100% chance to gain 1 Tactical Charge. Reduced to 25% against Mutant Opponents.
While Nick is under the effect of a Fury Effect, Tactical Charge durations are paused.
Nick loses 1 Charge every 6 seconds, decreasing to every 4 seconds while at or above 10 total Charges. Additionally if the Opponent performs a Well-Timed Block Nick loses 1 Charge.
At 5+ Charges: Nick's attacks can’t Miss or be Evaded.
At 10+ Charges: Nick's Purify effects now target all Debuffs.
At 15+ Charges: Nick becomes Unblockable.
At 20+ Charges: All Charges are removed and replaced with a Fury’s Fury Buff which grants 6168.6 Attack Rating for 10 seconds. All Tactical Charge gains are doubled while Fury’s Fury is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: When performing this attack Nick immediately gains 4 Tactical charges.
Disorients the Opponent, reducing their Block Proficiency by 50% and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 70% for 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Nick slashes his Opponent causing up to 4 stacks of Bleed, each dealing 856.75 damage over 8 seconds.
50% chance to stun the Opponent for 3 seconds. Stun chance increases by a flat 10% for each of Nick’s Tactical charges.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Additional 6854 Attack if Fury’s Fury is active.
Additional 6854 Attack if Internal Bleed is active.
